<title level="1" pfs="">[Pitax Warden](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2322)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 35

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 33

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 12">[Pitax Warden](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2322)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 336</row>

**Perception** +22

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Hallit](/Languages.aspx?ID=37)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +22, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +25, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +24, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +20, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +24, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +20

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +2

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
+_1 [full plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13)_, _[+1 striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=380) [greatsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=24)_, [moderate healing potions](/Equipment.aspx?ID=186) (2), [Composite Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75) (20 arrows)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 33 

**Fort** +23 

**Ref** +21 

**Will** +23 

</row>

**HP** 215

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" />

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_greatsword_ +26 ([versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 2d12+9 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortbow +23 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+9 piercing

**Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 30, attack +22
- **Cantrips (4th)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244) (1 slot)
- **2nd**
[Telekinetic Maneuver](/Spells.aspx?ID=333) (1 slot)
- **3rd**
[Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147) (1 slot)
- **4th**
[Discern Lies](/Spells.aspx?ID=74) (1 slot)

**Power Attack** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The warden makes a melee Strike. This counts as two attacks for their multiple attack penalty. If it hits, it deals an extra die of weapon damage.

**Sudden Charge** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The Pitax warden dashes up to their foe and swings. They Stride twice; if they end their movement within melee reach of at least one enemy, they can make a melee Strike against that enemy.

</column>
name: Pitax Warden

text: Pitax Warden Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 35 Unspecific Lore : DC 33 Specific Lore : DC 30 Pitax Warden Source Kingmaker Adventure Path pg. 336 Perception +22 Languages Common, Hallit Skills Acrobatics +22, Athletics +25, Intimidation +24, Occultism +20, Performance +24, Society +20 Str +5 Dex +2 Con +3 Int +0 Wis +2 Cha +4 Items + 1 full plate , +1 striking greatsword , moderate healing potions (2), Composite Shortbow (20 arrows) --- AC 33 Fort +23 Ref +21 Will +23 HP 215 Attack of Opportunity Reaction --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action greatsword +26 (versatile P), Damage 2d12+9 slashing Ranged Single Action shortbow +23 (deadly d10, Propulsive, reload 0), Damage 1d6+9 piercing Occult Spontaneous Spells DC 30, attack +22 - Cantrips (4th) Daze, Shield - 1st Ray of Enfeeblement (1 slot) - 2nd Telekinetic Maneuver (1 slot) - 3rd Haste (1 slot) - 4th Discern Lies (1 slot) Power Attack Two Actions The warden makes a melee Strike. This counts as two attacks for their multiple attack penalty. If it hits, it deals an extra die of weapon damage. Sudden Charge Two Actions The Pitax warden dashes up to their foe and swings. They Stride twice; if they end their movement within melee reach of at least one enemy, they can make a melee Strike against that enemy.
